member.name: DDiscFormat2EraseEvents.Update
member.summary: Implement this method to receive progress notification of the current erase operation.

param.name: object
param.para: The interface that initiated the erase operation.
This parameter is a MsftDiscFormat2Erase object in script.

member.param: Elapsed time, in seconds, of the erase operation.
Estimated time, in seconds, to complete the erase operation.

member.name: DDiscFormat2EraseEvents
member.summary: Implement this interface to receive notifications of the current erase operation.
